snippet.title: Planet Zoo: North America Animal Pack | Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
The Planet Zoo: North America Animal Pack is out now on Steam - https://store.steampowered.com/app/1747960/Planet_Zoo_North_America_Animal_Pack/ 

Welcome 8 new animals to your zoos: the industrious American Beaver, the towering and majestic Moose, the sleek and smart California Sea Lion, the shy and solitary Cougar, the enormous American Alligator, the highly-sociable Black-tailed Prairie Dog and the elusive yet adorable Arctic Fox. Joining them is a new Exhibit Animal: the American Bullfrog! You will also be able to enjoy a new Timed Scenario set in the foothills of the majestic Blue Ridge Mountains. 

For more news and information about Planet Zoo: 

Website: www.planetzoogame.com 
Facebook: www.facebook.com/PlanetZooGame 
Twitter: @PlanetZooGame 
Instagram: @PlanetZooGame 

Planet Zoo © 2021 Frontier Developments plc. All rights reserved.
